docstring.long_description:
With the IFFT algorithm, the input signal will be transformed from the frequency domain back into the time domain.

Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair
    The data to apply inverse FFT to.
docstring.short_description: Perform the Inverse Discrete Fourier Transform on an input signal.

parameters.name: real_signal
parameters.description: whether the input signal is real (true) or complex (false)
